Buffer | Mobile Product Designer, Product Engineer, Front-End Engineer | Full-time | Remote (anywhere on earth) | $78k-$114k (adjusted to your cost of living and XP).

• We Value clear communication, transparency, open-mindedness, empathy and patience are just a few of Buffer's cultural values. We are looking for a person who understands this culture and will thrive within a team of people passionate about self-improvement, honesty and openness.

• Apply here if you think you'd suit! http://journey.buffer.com
